s.label: Ionospheric model (Z-Jones) settings
s.desc: Settings describing a simple, 2-dimensional ionospheric phase screen model.

s.label: Enable
s.desc: Enable evaluation of the Z-Jones when performing interferometric simulations.

s.label: Minimum elevation (deg)
s.desc: Minimum elevation for which ionospheric phase values are evaluated. Below this specified elevation, no ionospheric phase values are applied. This setting is provided as TEC screen evaluation functions may be poorly defined very far away from the phase centre.

s.label: Zero offset TEC value
s.desc: The underlying value of constant TEC. This is used to scale the differential TEC values evaluated for the Z-Jones phase calculation.

s.label: TID parameter file(s)
s.desc: Comma separated list to filename paths of OSKAR TID parameter files.

s.label: TEC image settings
s.desc: Settings for creating an image of the Ionospheric TEC screen as defined by the Ionospheric model settings.

s.label: Station index
s.desc: Station Index for which to calculate the TEC screen.

s.label: Centre TEC image on the beam direction
s.desc: Centre the TEC image on the station (primary) beam direction. This is the direction defined by the observation settings.

s.label: Image Field of view (deg)
s.desc: Field of view of the TEC image, in degrees.

s.label: Image size (number of pixels)
s.desc: Number of pixels along each dimension of the TEC image.

s.label: Output file name
s.desc: The output file name path of the TEC image produced. In order for the image file to be produced at least one of FITS or OSKAR image format selections must be enabled.

s.label: Save image as FITS format
s.desc: Save the TEC image in FITS format.
